prop.name: loggedIn
prop.description: Indicates whether the account is logged in for this run.

method.name: authenticate
method.description: Authenticates an account with the given username and password.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id to authenticate. If empty, get the current account id.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: login
method.description: Authenticates an account and sets it as logged in.

parameter.name: $rememberme
parameter.description: Whether to remember the user in the database or not.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validates if the user is logged in.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: deleteActiveSession
method.description: Deletes a given account session.

parameter.name: $sessionID
parameter.description: The account session id to be deleted.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: logout
method.description: Logout the account from the system.

method.name: switchAccount
method.description: Switch from one account to another.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The new account id to switch to.

method.returndescription: Returns TRUE on success and FALSE if the current account is locked and cannot switch.

method.name: updatePassword
method.description: Update current account password.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: resetPassword
method.description: Reset the account password using the reset id created by the reset form.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: rememberme
method.description: Gets whether the system remembers the logged in account.
method.returndescription: True if the system remembers the account, false otherwise.

method.name: getAccountID
method.description: Gets the current logged in account id.

method.name: getMX
method.description: Gets the current mx id.

method.name: getSessionID
method.description: Gets the account session id.

method.name: getPersonID
method.description: Gets the person id of the logged in person.

method.name: isLocked
method.description: Checks whether this account is locked.

method.name: getAccountFolder
method.description: Gets the account's folder. The folder is created if doesn't exist.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description:
The account id to get the folder for.
NOTICE: This doesn't work when in secure mode.

method.returndescription: The account folder path. If there is no active account, it returns FALSE.

method.name: getServicesFolder
method.description: Get a service's folder inside the account root folder.

parameter.name: $systemAppData
parameter.description: This indicates the service folder as System App and will be placed in a special folder. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: isAdmin
method.description: Checks whether the account is admin.

method.name: getAccountTitle
method.description: Gets the account title for the logged in account.

method.name: getUsername
method.description: Get the account's username.

parameter.name: $emailFallback
parameter.description: Set TRUE to return the connected person's email if the account's username is empty. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: Return the account username. If account doesn't have username, return the email of the person connected to this account. If there is no connected account, return NULL.

method.name: info
method.description: Gets the account info.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id to get the information for. Leave empty for the current account. It is empty by default. If it's not the current account, only public information will be returned.

method.returndescription: Returns an array of the account information.

method.name: updateProfileImage
method.description: Update the account profile image.

parameter.name: $image
parameter.description: The image data. The image should be in png format.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id. If empty or in secure mode this will be the current account. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: createSession
method.description: Creates a new account session.

parameter.name: $rememberme
parameter.description: Whether to remember the user in the database or not.

method.name: getSaltedMix
method.description: Returns the salted mix of account, person and salt.
method.returndescription: The salted mix to store to cookies.

method.name: getSalt
method.description: Gets the stored salt for the current account session.

method.name: updateSessionData
method.description: Updates the account's data to the session.

parameter.name: $accountData
parameter.description: The account data. If not given, it is loaded from the database.

method.name: getSessionData
method.description: Get all current session data from the database for the current account.
method.returndescription: An array of all session data.

method.name: getAccountValue
method.description: Gets an account value from the session. If the session is not set yet, updates from the database.

method.name: getInfo
method.description: Gets an account's information.

parameter.name: $accountID
parameter.description: The account id to get information for.

method.name: getFolderID
method.description: Gets the unique folder id for the requested use.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: The extension of the folder (if any).
